text: Valentin Ivanovich Bakulin (; 30 January 1945 â€“ 24 February 2022) was a Russian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation. He was in the Federation Council from 2001 to 2004. Bakulin died in Ivanovo, Russia on 24 February 2022, at the age of 77. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Russian communist politicians Category:People from Ivanovo Oblast Category:Members of the Federation Council (Russia)
title: Valentin Bakulin
